verbs.description: The Republican tax plan [V: was] going to be the centerpiece of the GOP 's midterm strategy . Then Trump decided it was " boring . "
The Republican tax plan was [V: going] to be the centerpiece of the GOP 's midterm strategy . Then Trump decided it was " boring . "
[ARG1: The Republican tax plan] was going to [V: be] [ARG2: the centerpiece of the GOP 's midterm strategy] . Then Trump decided it was " boring . "
The Republican tax plan was going to be the centerpiece of the GOP 's midterm strategy . [ARGM-TMP: Then] [ARG0: Trump] [V: decided] [ARG1: it was " boring] . "
The Republican tax plan was going to be the centerpiece of the GOP 's midterm strategy . Then Trump decided [ARG1: it] [V: was] " [ARG2: boring] . "
